Home / Interviews / Interviews by Conference / SCNA 2011

SCNA 2011

SCNA 2011 brings together 11 interviews from 2011. Recurring themes include community building and user-group organizing, Boston SC, and Chicago Alt.NET. Featured interviewees include Bobby Johnson, Charler Baker, Drew Shefman, and Dustin Updyke.

  • Coverage: 11 interviews from 2011.
  • Featured interviewees: Bobby Johnson, Charler Baker, Drew Shefman, Dustin Updyke, and London Software Craftsmanship.
  • Common themes: community building and user-group organizing, Boston SC, Chicago Alt.NET, ChicagoRuby, and Cleveland & Pittsburgh Community.

Trusted Sources

  • https://web.archive.org/web/20111229061750/http://scna.softwarecraftsmanship.org/
  • https://8thlight.com/insights/my-proposal-for-scna-2011

Sergio Pereira — Chicago Alt.NET
★ Transcript Available
Interviewee: Sergio Pereira
Topic: Chicago Alt.NET
Duration: 15 min · Uploaded: Nov 19, 2011
Conference: SCNA 2011 · Community: General
View Interview Watch on Vimeo Watch on Youtube
microsoft illinois chicago alt-net chicago-alt-net ugtastic interview sergio-pereira conference scna software-craftsmanship-north-america scna-2011 ruby testing developer-community-and-conference-conversations community
Video description: My first interview for Ugtastic is with Sergio Pereira who runs the Chicago Alt.NET group. Chicago Alt.NET holds a special place in my heart as it's the first user-group I attended and the first user-group I ever spoke at. Sergio shares his feelings on providing a platform for developers who may not otherwise have an opportunity to get up and share their experience and passions via Chicago Alt.NET. This was my first interview so comments and tips are welcome. Sergio is a great sport and I really appreciate him taking the time to sit down and chat about Chicago Alt.NET.
